data.text:
Arthur Conan Doyle's outstanding character is that of sympathy, mingled with hospitality. Arthur Conan Doyle have a great urge to make others a little happier for having met Arthur Conan Doyle. No higher quality could be possessed than this but it is one that may be carried to excess. Arthur Conan Doyle spend lot of time and money for the sake of others.Arthur Conan Doyle's tastes are of a cultured order and, at heart, Arthur Conan Doyle have a love for literary and artistic work of a high grade, though the commercial existence, which Arthur Conan Doyle must probably follow, may force them out of sight.Regarding money, Arthur Conan Doyle have peculiar views. At times Arthur Conan Doyle deny Arthur Conan Doyle'sself legitimate necessaries and at others, Arthur Conan Doyle spend somewhat recklessly. Arthur Conan Doyle will always give in response to the call of charity. On some occasions, Arthur Conan Doyle put Arthur Conan Doyle'sself to considerable trouble in order to save a few rupees on the price of an article Arthur Conan Doyle desire to purchase.Arthur Conan Doyle's chief weakness is that Arthur Conan Doyle are somewhat easily impressed. In fact, Arthur Conan Doyle believe too much of what Arthur Conan Doyle hear. Unscrupulous people are quick to notice this defect in Arthur Conan Doyle and they are certain to trade it sooner or later. Therefore, be on Arthur Conan Doyle's guard and avoid being victimised by someone who may come to Arthur Conan Doyle in the guise of a friend.

Expecting too much too soon, Arthur Conan Doyle are under tremendous inner tension and are too stubborn to compromise. Extremely nervous, Arthur Conan Doyle scatter Arthur Conan Doyle's energies by doing too many things at once and rarely complete anything, for there is always something new to discover. At later part of Arthur Conan Doyle's age, Arthur Conan Doyle may experience migraine headaches and must learn to relax. Any sort of combined physical and mental discipline such as yoga is an excellent remedy.The power of profound thinking has been invested upon Arthur Conan Doyle, which helps Arthur Conan Doyle to get hold of things swiftly. However, this procedure is quite time taking, which can give birth to boredom. Arthur Conan Doyle will work hard in Arthur Conan Doyle's studies and maintain a studious nature. Learning Arthur Conan Doyle's lessons regularly will help Arthur Conan Doyle in completing Arthur Conan Doyle's studies. Arthur Conan Doyle are also likely to get stuck in a particular subject, but regular revisions will help Arthur Conan Doyle get through it. Sometimes, Arthur Conan Doyle may not get Arthur Conan Doyle's desired results but Arthur Conan Doyle will obtain knowledge in abundance which will provide Arthur Conan Doyle success in various aspects of life.
